title: Annual Sports Day Celebration
content: Join us for our annual sports day featuring exciting competitions, cultural performances, and awards ceremony. All parents and students are invited to participate.

title: Science Exhibition 2024
content: Students showcase innovative science projects and experiments in our annual exhibition. Projects will be judged by external experts and winners will receive certificates.

title: Admissions Open for 2025-26
content: Enroll your child for the academic year 2025-26. Limited seats available. Early bird discount available for applications submitted before January 31, 2025.

title: Winter Break Schedule
content: School will remain closed for winter break from December 25, 2024 to January 5, 2025. Classes will resume on January 6, 2025.

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting
content: Quarterly parent-teacher meeting scheduled for December 20, 2024. Please contact the class teacher to schedule your appointment.

title: Library Week Celebration
content: Join us for Library Week from December 8-14, 2024. Special activities include book reading sessions, storytelling, and book fair.

title: Transport Fee Revision
content: Transport fees for the academic year 2025-26 have been revised. New fee structure will be effective from April 1, 2025.

title: Cultural Program - Diwali Celebration
content: Students will present cultural programs celebrating Diwali on November 12, 2024. Parents are invited to attend the program.
